about_the_game:
Gem Tetris is a creative twist on the classic Tetris formula, blending timeless block-stacking gameplay with the sparkle and strategy of dazzling gemstones. Place, rotate, and strategize your moves to create stunning chain reactions and maximize your score!

Key Features

  • Gem-Themed Blocks: Each block is embedded with vibrant gems that light up your screen with spectacular visuals.

  • Chain Explosions: Match specific gem blocks to trigger powerful chain reactions and score massive bonuses.

Who Is This Game For?

Whether you're a longtime fan of Tetris or simply love sparkling gemstones, Gem Tetris offers a perfect mix of nostalgia and innovation for everyone to enjoy.

Ready to Shine?

Put on your crown and light up the game board with your gem-clearing prowess!

name: Gem Tetris

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
